title: RT News - October 25, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: Violent protests demanding social reform grip Chile, just a week ago it was seen as an "oasis" compared to other Latin American countries. Russian 'gun rights' activist Maria Butina is due for release from jail in the US. She was accused of being 'an unregistered lobbyist' while the media smeared her as a 'Russian honey-trap spy'. A worrying trend from Germany where over 40% of those surveyed are tired of hearing about the Holocaust - that's the result of a study by a Jewish group in the country. It was released just two weeks after a deadly attack on a synagogue there.
description: Violent protests demanding social reform grip Chile, just a week ago it was seen as an "oasis" compared to other Latin American countries
